org.buildmlearn.appstore.utils

Class SlidingTabStrip

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • org.buildmlearn.appstore.utils.SlidingTabStrip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    class SlidingTabStrip
extends android.widget.LinearLayout
    Helper class which creates the Tabs strips for the Home Page for Tab View.

      • blendColors

        private static int blendColors(int color1,
                               int color2,
                               float ratio)
        Blend color1 and color2 using the given ratio.
        Parameters:
        ratio - of which to blend. 1.0 will return color1, 0.5 will give an even blend, 0.0 will return color2.
